properties.displayName: [Deprecated]: API apps should have 'Client Certificates (Incoming client certificates)' enabled
properties.description: Client certificates allow for the app to request a certificate for incoming requests. Only clients that have a valid certificate will be able to reach the app. We recommend all customers who are still using API Apps to implement the built-in policy called 'App Service apps should have 'Client Certificates (Incoming client certificates)' enabled', which is scoped to include API apps in addition to Web Apps.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
